Duo_Maxwell

If you were a girl, would you want to be bi?
 
 I would in a heartbeat!
mana'ia
No, I'd be a lesbian. Guys are nasty. I don't see what girls see in guys.
jitobear

Weird question. It's like asking me if I would prefer to be black. I am what I am.
 
 I do like men - yes they are nasty - but the ones with guitars can be soooooo cute. emoticon_xlove 
 
 
 I don't know that I would say no to Angelina Jolie, though. I know many straight women who feel this way - - gay men, too - she be WAY HOT. Oh - and I love a good XXX - on anyone. :p
JustineCredible

Ok, well, since I am a lesbian...does that mean I'd have to choose to be either straight or bi? Or does that mean I would have to choose between my current lesbian state or being bi? Or what? 
 
 I'm really not sure what the question would be. I mean I've been with men, I never liked it, I just thought it was perfunctory.
jyoshu

I don't know that I would say no to Angelina Jolie, though. I know many straight women who feel this way - - gay men, too - she be WAY HOT.

 
 I have to agree with you here, from a straight perspective anyway.
college_girl

I'm bi and I'm happy with that; it's like having the best of both worlds in a way. Plus it's a lot more convenient than being a lesbian, because I can go out with a guy occasionally and maintain the illusion of being straight for my parents.
GuyWithNoBrain
im not a girl nor would i imagine myself i was. but i support the bi for female :)
ddavejb

I used to think being bi made things so easy. Huge pool of love interests, right? Not! My best friend is bi and she has more problems being accepted by most people(even some gay people) than I do for being gay. I would rather just deal with attraction to one gender thank you very much! For me, men are tough enough to figure out and I am one! I LOVE women friendship-wise. Romantically, though, I'll leave them to the straight guys and lesbians.(oops, and bi girls too!)
Jaxian

I don't know that I would say no to Angelina Jolie, though. I know many straight women who feel this way - - gay men, too - she be WAY HOT.

 
 I appear to be the only person in the world who does not find Angelina Jolie attractive. Well, uh, I mean, I think she's attractive, just not as attractive as most other movie stars.
 
 
I LOVE women friendship-wise. Romantically, though, I'll leave them to the straight guys and lesbians.(oops, and bi girls too!)

 
 Ahem, you seem to have forgotten about the bi guys.
ddavejb

Ahem, you seem to have forgotten about the bi guys.

 
 You're absolutely right! How thoughtless of me!
JustineCredible

I appear to be the only person in the world who does not find Angelina Jolie attractive. Well, uh, I mean, I think she's attractive, just not as attractive as most other movie stars.

 
 
 Actually no, I mean, she's ok...but not really my cup of tea. 
 I don't know, somehow incestuous movie stars just aren't on my "hot" list. emoticon_rolleyes
